title: Judge Rips Stephen Miller as “Ignorant or Incompetent, or Both”
description: A federal judge on Wednesday shredded the Trump administration’s shallow defense for bragging about its rampant, warrantless immigration arrests.In an 88-page ruling, U.S. Judge Beryl Howell wrote that the Trump administration had illegally lowered the standa…
